title: Trailer: 2020 Supercross
excerpt: A trailer for the official preview show.
author: Lewis Phillips
content:
Subscribe to MX Vice on YouTube.

Follow @MXVice on Instagram.

The 2020 Monster Energy Supercross season is just a little over a week away at this point. Can you believe it? Although the level of hype is already at an all-time high, the video below should help out a ton. The official preview show will be airing on the NBC Sports Network in the United States on December 27. The full-length programme will be available at that point but for the time being enjoy the trailer for the show. This really is mouth-watering stuff.

Video: Monster Energy Supercross | Lead Image: Race Kawasaki
